trans-unit.source: Associates an action taken on an activity designer on the workflow design surface with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Associa uma ação executada em um designer de atividade na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho com o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A designer action is a user action that is performed when you activate a designer glyph on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um designer é uma ação do usuário que é executada quando você ativar um glifo designer na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerAction class is used to indicate your actions.
trans-unit.target: A classe DesignerAction é usada para indicar suas ações.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerAction class is also used to add the task items by the adornment service.
trans-unit.target: A classe DesignerAction também é usada para adicionar os itens de tarefa pelo serviço de adorno.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, and a string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> classe usando um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>, um número inteiro e uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is taken.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> no qual a ação designer é realizada.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o identificador de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto associado à ação designer.

trans-unit.source: activityDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: text contains a null reference () or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: textcontém uma referência nula () ou seu tamanho é 0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, a string, and an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> classe usando <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>, um número inteiro, uma cadeia de caracteres e um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is to appear.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> no qual a ação designer é exibido.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o identificador de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto associado à ação designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> deve ser associada com a ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: activityDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: text contains a null reference () or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: textcontém uma referência nula () ou seu tamanho é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador para a ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the identifier for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o identificador para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada com a ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> que está associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*> method of the activity designer associated with the current designer action.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*>método do designer de atividade associado com a ação de designer atual.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A> method is called when you click a validation error displayed by the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A>método é chamado quando você clicar em um erro de validação exibido pelo designer de atividade na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the property that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Representa o nome da propriedade que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: In the property editor, the property that corresponds to the PropertyName of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> provides a visual cue that signals the presence of an associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.
trans-unit.target: No editor de propriedade, a propriedade que corresponde ao PropertyName do que <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>fornece uma indicação visual que indica a presença de um associado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o nome da propriedade.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto associado à ação designer.

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the text associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of user data associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um dicionário de dados de usuário associados com a ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que representa os dados de usuário associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
